captions.text: Which is why traffic lights are the most dangerous place for people on foot in town.
So what would happen if we made waiting a bit more fun?
Allow us to present: the dancing traffic light figure
Every dance was transmitted to the traffic lights in real time.

The result?
81% more people waited for the light to turn green.
For more safety on our roads.

title: The Dancing Traffic Light Manikin by smart

comments.text:
الرقص الذكي للإشارة الضوئية
The Dancing Traffic Light Manikin by smart
 
اشارات المرور الضوئية في هي عادة من بين المواقع الأكثر خطورة.
حاولت شركة تسمى الذكية "سمارت"  أن تجعل الانتظار على المارة  المشاة أكثر 
احتمالاً وأكثر متعة.
 
حيث استخدمت تقنية الامساك او القبض على التماس لراقصات وراقصين في كشك بعيد 
وتستخدم الاقتراحات للتحكم بإشارة "الرجل التوقف الحمراء" التقليدية في إشارة 
المرور، ولتمنح بذلك الكثير من السرور المارة، الذين كانوا إلى حد كبير الأكثر 
عرضه لخطر ممر عبور المشاة.
 
 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SB_0vRnkeOk﻿

comments.text:
I do not agree that this is so useful. This seems just as a cheap ad. As 
you see in this video, it mainly shows the dancers in the box, with a touch 
of dance hit music, but the other people on the road are so bored. That is 
why the video maker skips carefully the roads and concentrates to people 
who dance in the box. Who tf care those? This video is made for not so 
smart people who quickly get attracted in thinking a movie is a real thing.
Besides, the reality looks different, like this: A dancing traffic light 
like this would make people not to take it so serious anymore and would 
make them even ignore it at all.﻿
